author: voith
content: 10 am ET Tuesday works for me. However, I can't speak for others

author: samwilsn
content: Should we continue merging around https://github.com/ethereum/eth1.0-specs/pull/280 or would you like a chance to rebase <@!564718359304863744>?

author: voith
content:
<@!689161464829050960> I'm working on rebasing 280 right now. 
Can you instead take a look at https://github.com/ethereum/eth1.0-specs/pull/303
and https://github.com/ethereum/eth1.0-specs/pull/304

author: samwilsn
content: Yep! Is there an order for the outstanding PRs that reduces merge conflicts?

author: voith
content: For my PRs I'd like 303 to be merged first followed by 304.

author: peter.davies
content: I've completely redesigned the State interface in 302. Given that other pull requests contain utility functions to work around the limitations of the old interface, I think we should give 302 priority.
